item.title: Learn Test1
item.description: Today we are looking at new german words. A bunch of nouns Neuanfang, Bücher, Sport, Zeitand verbs machen, lesen, verbringen, treiben. Maxime wants to make some serious changes in his Life and wants to start a new beginning on his birthday tomorrow. He plans to do a lot of things: He’d love to get up early every morning and do some sport for at least 20min. He wishes to read more books, as he remembers that he loved books when he was a kid.
